channel.title: I bootstrapped my first SaaS business to $643K in ARR [AMA]
channel.description:
Hello everyone,
New to this community and happy to be here. Seems like some healthy discussions going on and happy to contribute and answer any questions about my journey.
I bootstrapped my first SaaS business to $643k in ARR (as of Sept, 2020) and it was a lot of hard work. Made lots of mistakes, but it paid off in the end.

item.title: I bootstrapped my first SaaS business to $643K in ARR [AMA]
item.dc:creator: travisrr
item.description:
Thanks for the headsup!! I do need to go back through and “audit” the new homepage!

Read full topic

item.title: I bootstrapped my first SaaS business to $643K in ARR [AMA]
item.dc:creator: skmurphy
item.description:
For more on the first year of Accelerlist see this interview with Travis Renn by Courtland Allen https://www.indiehackers.com/interview/making-2-4-mo-helping-customers-sell-on-amazon-66619c1c4b

Read full topic
item.source: I bootstrapped my first SaaS business to $643K in ARR [AMA]

item.title: I bootstrapped my first SaaS business to $643K in ARR [AMA]
item.dc:creator: Kjell-Ake_Gafvelin
item.description:
Your homepage looks very nice, but it seems like it is not quite finished yet.

  • In the pricing table on each column the mouse pointer changes to the “hand”, but you can only click on the top and bottom buttons. If you click on the “Start your 14 days FREE trial” button nothing happens.
  • 2 out of 12 links in the footer actually works.

Read full topic
item.source: I bootstrapped my first SaaS business to $643K in ARR [AMA]

item.title: I bootstrapped my first SaaS business to $643K in ARR [AMA]
item.dc:creator: travisrr
item.description:
We acquired our first 10 customers hanging out where our customers already were, Facebook Groups. I had no strategy for growth. I just built a tool i needed to use anyways and then found more people like me that had the same problem.

Read full topic

item.title: I bootstrapped my first SaaS business to $643K in ARR [AMA]
item.dc:creator: hxb3b7xx2
item.description:
Congrats! Stories like this are very motivating and keep many of us going.

  • What were the biggest mistakes you made pre-launch and in the first year?
  • Any (low cost) strategies you found useful to drive traffic to your site in the early days?

Read full topic
